name: Drakewood
description:
Drakewood

Explore the small seaside town of Drakewood, meet the residents, venture into the mysterious dark forest, and discover ancient secrets. I don't want to give too much away, but there are things here that the regular townsfolk don't know about ...

Use the arrow keys to move.

This game was created in a week for the Bratislava Game Jam.

I was hoping to add dialog and the ability to pick up and use items, but didn't have time during the jam. There will be a full release with those features afterward. The full release will also include more world building and secrets.

I'm still working on the lore, so if you have any ideas, I'd love to hear them. What do you think happened here?
